verses.verse: These are the inheritances which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5157>took<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> which <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> distributed to <S%H5157>them,<s%>

by the <S%H1486>lot<s%> of their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> for the <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> and for <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H4294>half-tribe.<s%>

For <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4294>tribes<s%> and <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H4294>half-tribe<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> but to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> no <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> among <S%H8432>them.<s%>

For the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim:<s%> and they <S%H5414>gave<s%> no <S%H2506>portion<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> except <S%H5892>cities<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H4054>in,<s%> with their suburbs for their <S%H4735>livestock<s%> and for their <S%H7075>property.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and they <S%H2505>divided<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Then the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H5066>drew<s%> near to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> the <S%H7074>Kenizzite<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3045>him,<s%> "You know the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> concerning <S%H182>me<s%> and concerning <S%H182>you<s%> in Kadesh <S%H6947>Barnea.<s%>

I was <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me from Kadesh <S%H6947>Barnea<s%> to spy <S%H7270>out<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%> I <S%H7725>brought<s%> him <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> as it was in my <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

<S%H251>Nevertheless,<s%> my brothers who went <S%H5927>up<s%> with me made the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4529>melt;<s%> but I <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H776><s%> 'Surely the land where <S%H7272>you<s%> <S%H1869>walked<s%> shall be an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to you and to your <S%H1121%H99999>children<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> because you have <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>'

<S%H3068>"Now,<s%> behold, Yahweh has kept me <S%H2421>alive,<s%> as he <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> these <S%H705>forty-five<s%> <S%H2568><s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> from the <S%H227>time<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> while <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%> <S%H8084>Now,<s%> behold, I am eighty-five <S%H2568><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H3117>today.<s%>

As yet I am as <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> as I was in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3581>me:<s%> as my strength was <S%H3581>then,<s%> even so is my strength now for <S%H4421>war,<s%> to go <S%H3318>out<s%> and to come <S%H935>in.<s%>

Now therefore <S%H5414>give<s%> me this <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H3068>country,<s%> of which Yahweh <S%H1696>spoke<s%> in that <S%H3117>day;<s%> for you <S%H8085>heard<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> how the <S%H6062>Anakim<s%> were <S%H1419>there,<s%> and great and <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%> It may <S%H194>be<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will be <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3423>me,<s%> and I shall drive them out, as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke.<s%>"
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H5414>him;<s%> and he gave <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> to <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

Therefore <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> became the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> the <S%H7074>Kenizzite<s%> to this <S%H3117>day;<s%> because he <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> was Kiriath <S%H7153>Arba,<s%> after the <S%H1419>greatest<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> among the <S%H6062>Anakim.<s%> The <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H8252>rest<s%> from <S%H4421>war.<s%>
